item.title: Full Herblore for Delta
item.dc:creator: @RandQm RandQm
item.description:
@RandQm wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:33, topic:428813”][quote author=RandQm link=topic=531509.msg3988527#msg3988527 date=1336255778]

this is an very good tutorial…

nice scripts included…

but, can you make on server downloads a great delta server release and this tutorial put in the links, of that tutorial so we can see simply & easy? coding it on an perfect delta server etc…

There isn’t such thing as a “perfect delta server”
and this is simply & easy,
If you can’t add this you shouldn’t be programming.
[/quote]

Speaking of this. I need grahams event manager for my delta, so I can also add the agility base you made

Your skill tuts are awesome btw.[/quote]

I use his task system,
it’s posted on r-s with instructions on how to add it.

Read full topic

item.title: Full Herblore for Delta
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

There’s no need for the whole dose left String array.

Can just be simplified into this:

	public String getString(String item) {
		if(item.contains("(4)"))
			return "You have 3 doses of potion left.";
		if(item.contains("(3)"))
			return "You have 2 doses of potion left.";
		if(item.contains("(2)"))
			return "You have 1 dose of potion left.";
		if(item.contains("(1)"))
			return "You have finished your potion.";
		return "You have finished your potion.";
	}

Read full topic
